author: sisbell
msg: Fix for finding poms on local path.

author: cmchen
msg: Fixed two issues in the PNG reader.  Wasn't handling the 16-bit mode 4 PNGs properly.  Also, wasn't gamma-correcting non-palette values properly in PNGs.
Added very helpful pngs (and variants) to the test suite and added a unit test around png->gif conversion.
Also, took the opportunity to remove some debuging statements and dead code.

author: gnodet
msg: Use the locationURI provided on the soap provider endpoint to override any value retrieved from the wsdl

author: mcooper
msg: Fixed a problem where you could not PPR a labelled item in the panelFormLayout.  There was no ID on the TR element so the fragment could only be ignored.  Added an example of this on the panelFormLayout demo page.
Implemented support for FlattenedComponent children in the panelFormLayout, e.g. iterator and switcher.  Added an example of this on the panelFormLayout demo page.
Implemented support for labelAlignment="start|top" so that you can override the default of start on root panelFormLayouts and of top on nested panelFormLayouts.
